meanings.definition: A small wheel on a swivel attached to the legs or base of a piece of furniture to make it easier to move.
meanings.sent1: The castors on the chair allowed it to glide smoothly across the floor.
meanings.sent2: She added castors to the bottom of the table to make it more portable.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play with the castors on the cabinet, making it wobble.
meanings.sent4: With the castors spinning effortlessly, the desk seemed to dance around the room.
meanings.sent5: The castors, like tiny wheels of magic, transformed the heavy dresser into a movable wonder.
